Issue.creator: btl5037
Issue.summary: Investigate and Remediate Breaking BCCSP FileKeyStore Change Between 1.4.6 and 1.4.7
Issue.description: 1.4.7 introduced a breaking change in Fabric around the BCCSP FileKeyStore option, investigate what caused this issue and remediate it for a new release and update this Jira with the details once we have an understanding of the cause.
